name: Trek Adventure
description:
Trek Adventure is a text-adventure game inspired by the Star Trek TV series and subsequent movies. In the game the player starts at the wrecked bridge of the Enterprise after a freak ion storm. It is up to the player to fix the ship again and prevent it from crashing into a planet.

The game plays like a typical text adventure of the time. The player can move around look at items, pick things up and solve simple puzzles with items.
